code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Goal=_ref=>{let{num,prevGoal,updateGoal}=_ref;const[goal,setGoal]=useState(prevGoal);const handleTextChange=event=>{setGoal(event.target.value);updateGoal(event.target.value);};useEffect(()=>{setGoal(prevGoal);},[prevGoal]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"goalInput",value:goal,onChange:handleTextChange,placeholder:"#"+num+' 디지털 클론을 통해 달성하고자 하는 목표를 입력해 주세요.'},num);};
